meanings: Adverb 주의하여, 조심스럽게, 신중히, 정성 들여서, 검소하게
Noun 돌봄, 보살핌 (→community care, day care, easy-care, health care, intensive care)

vlive.korean: 우리 부모님들이 약간... - 역시! - 조심스럽게 - 프로잖아! Our parents are kind of... - As expected! - Carefully! - We are pros! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Our parents are kind of... - As expected! - Carefully! - We are pros!

vlive.korean: 맞아 - 어차피 하트 이렇게 해서 조심히 찍으면 하트 모양 그대로 있지 않을까? That's right. - It's like a heart here, so if I stamp it carefully, won't it be like a heart? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: That's right. - It's like a heart here, so if I stamp it carefully, won't it be like a heart?

vlive.korean: [조심스럽게 한 땀 한 땀 분리 중] 당면... [Carefully] Glass noodles... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
[신중하게 대답 중인데] 저희는 서울대라는 어떤 이름? [Answering carefully] The name value of SNU? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 19. 3억 쯤은 다들 있ㅈㅕ..?? FLEX 터지는 서울대 바팩과 붙을 학교는??
vlive.english: [Answering carefully] The name value of SNU?

vlive.korean: [유심] 렛츠고 킴! [Carefully] Let's go, Kim! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.89

examples.korean: Wrap it up carefully to protect against breakage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것이 파손되지 않도록 잘 포장해라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Wrap it up carefully to protect against breakage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She manoeuvred the car carefully into the garage. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 차를 조심조심 차고에 넣었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She manoeuvred the car carefully into the garage. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She enunciated each word slowly and carefully. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 말 한 마디 한 마디를 천천히 신중하게 발음했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She enunciated each word slowly and carefully. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It behoves us to study these findings carefully. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 이 발견 사항들을 면밀히 연구할 필요가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It behoves us to study these findings carefully. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The statement was carefully scrutinized before publication. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 성명은 발표 전에 면밀히 검토되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The statement was carefully scrutinized before publication. Add to Wordbook
